short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds Steam64ID, Accountid, Add button and Faceit data to sidebar on Steam profiles

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a little sidebar on Steam profiles to display the following:
- Steam64ID
- AccountID
- Faceit elo (if available)
- "Add on local machine" button (opens Steam app on PC)
